name: @matthamlin/react-media
description: This component is a simple wrapper around the `window.matchMedia` functionality, as such it will only work (as intended) in browsers at or above the versions from this table: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Window/matchMedia.
author: Matthew Hamlin <hamlim@outlook.com> (https://matthamlin.me/)
